Ingredients Ingredients of Detox Capsule: Each 500 mg capsule contains - Manjista - Rubia Cordifolia - 400 mg Mandukaparni - 250 mg [Jyotishmati - mg - Malkangani - 250 mg [Trivrit - Operculina ](https://easyayurveda.com/2014/03/03/trivrit-operculina-turpethum-usage-dose-side-effects/)- 250 mg - Trivrit is an important Ayurvedic herb, used in treatment of Kapha and Pitta dominant disorders. Apart from being useful as a medicinal herb, it is also a very important herb used in Panchakarma treatment called as Virechana - Purgation treatment. Katuki - Picrorrhiza kurroa - 250 mg Pippali Piper longum - 250 mg Sariva - Hemidesmus Indicus - 250 mg Usheera - mg Bakuchi - 150 mg Haridra - Curcuma Capsule: Acute/chronic dermatitis Acne vulgaris Urticarial Jewelry Allergy Allergic disorders Indigestion [Jewellery Allergy: Causes, Home Remedy, Ayurveda Treatment](https://easyayurveda.com/2016/06/27/ayurvedic-treatment-skin-allergy-artificial-ornaments/) Dose and duration of use Dosage of Detox Capsule: 1-2 capsules twice or thrice a day, or as directed by the physician. How long to use? This product can be used for a period of 2 - 3 months of time, based on your doctor's advice. With western medicines Seek your doctor's advice if you are taking this product along with other western (allopathic/modern) medicines. Some Ayurvedic herbs can interact with modern medicine. If both Ayurvedic and allopathic medicines are advised together, then it is best to take allopathic medicine first, wait for 30 minutes and then, after a gap of 15 - 30 minutes, take Ayurvedic medicine or as directed by the physician. Can this be used while taking Homeopathic medicine? Yes. This product does not react with homeopathic medicine. With supplements like multivitamin tablets, Omega 3 fatty acids etc? Yes. Generally, this product goes well with most of the dietary supplements. However, if you are taking more than one product per day, please consult your doctor for an opinion. Side effects Side effects of Detox Capsule: There are no known side effects with this medicine Over dosage may cause loose stools. However, it is best to use this medicine under medical supervision. Store in a cool dry place, away from sunlight. Keep out of reach and sight of children. Seek your doctor's advice for its usage during pregnancy. This product can be safely used during lactation period and in children for a limited period of few weeks time.
